name: Vietnamese
description: Vietnamese is the official language of Vietnam and is spoken by over 100 million people worldwide. It uses a Latin-based alphabet called Quốc ngữ with extensive tone marking diacritics to represent the language's six lexical tones. Vietnamese has three main dialectal groups: Northern (Hanoi), Central (Huế), and Southern (Saigon), with significant phonetic and tonal variations between regions.
